original_title: Sri Lanka Thailand FTA to slash tariffs over 15 years
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s cabinet has approved a free trade agreement which will see 80 percent of tariff lines liberalized over 15 years, cabinet spokesman Bandula Gunawardana said.
About 5 percent of tariff lines will be partially freed from year 15 to 18.
About 15 percent of tariff lines will be in a negative list.
